scripts.postinstall: cd ./react/ && npm install && cd ../ts-web-component && npm install
scripts.build:react: cd ./react/ && rm -rf lib && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.build:ts-web-component: cd ./ts-web-component/ && rm -rf lib && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.watch:react: concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:server' 'npm run typecheck -- --watch' 'npm run dev:react'
scripts.watch:ts-web-component: concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:server' 'npm run typecheck -- --watch' 'npm run dev:ts-web-component'
scripts.prod:react: npm run clean:dist && cp -r ./react/dist/* ./dist/ && NODE_ENV=production node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./server/src/server.ts
scripts.prod:ts-web-component: npm run clean:dist && cp -r ./ts-web-component/dist/* ./dist/ && NODE_ENV=production node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./server/src/server.ts
